teamMembers.name: Richard O. Omboga
teamMembers.biography: With over 6 years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining web and desktop applications, Richard is Proficient in Java, C#, Kotlin, PHP, and JavaScript. Skilled in modern software development methodologies, cloud technologies, and DevOps practices. Adept at leading teams and mentoring junior developers. Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for staying updated with emerging technologies.

teamMembers.name: Angela K. Thomas
teamMembers.biography: Outgoing communicator with a brilliant educational background in Human Resources Management. Thorough understanding of the importance of external and internal communication protocols. Exceptional ability to handle HR roles in a professional manner.  Proficient in comprehending and analyzing information derived from human resource documents. Profound ability to oversee recruitment efforts and ensure employee retention
